import React from "react" function Login(){ const[email, setEmail] = useState() const[password, setPassword] = useState() const navigate = useNavigate() const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() axios.post('http://localhost:3001/login',{email, password}) .then(result => { console.log(result) if(result.data === "Success"){ navigate('/home') } }) .catch(err=> console.log(err)) } return(

Login

setEmail(e.target.value)}/>
setPassword(e.target.value)}/>

Sign up
) } export default Login;
